column1: Section:SW-General and Technical, Job Scheduling and Processing (7 Reqs)

column4: Provides job scheduling tools to automate administrative tasks such as data base backups or regular report production.
Provide ability to establish job dependencies and control subsequent job execution based on user-defined condition codes.
Allow authorized users to control priority of the batch process.
Allow authorized users to control job start time.
Allow authorized users to control job by transaction type.
Produce a log of job results.
Allow scheduling of report and query jobs.
